function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapidly growing literature on COVID-19","Impact":"Spread of misinformation and conflicting information","Mitigation":"Promotion of reliable sources and fact-checking","Technologies":"Data analysis and information verification tools","People":"General public, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Media outlets, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate data collection and review process","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the pandemic experience and its impact","Mitigation":"Standardized data collection protocols and peer review","Technologies":"Data management systems and peer review platforms","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on residential building design","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of disease transmission and containment measures","Mitigation":"Integration of ventilation and sanitation systems, spatial design for social distancing","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification technology, building information modeling","People":"Architects, urban planners, building managers","Owner":"Building design firms, government building regulatory bodies"}]}
